Duty: Must disclose the Indigenous Peoples or local community that provided the traditional knowledge.

Duty: Must disclose the source of traditional knowledge if the provider’s identity is unknown.

Duty: Must provide guidance to meet disclosure requirements.

Duty: Must not require verification of the disclosed information.
Immunity: Not obligated to verify the authenticity of disclosed information.
Duty: Must make disclosed information available per patent procedures while protecting confidentiality.
Duty: Must not impose retroactive disclosure obligations.
Immunity: Pre‑existing applications are exempt from new disclosure obligations.

Duty: Must provide an opportunity to rectify failure to disclose.

Power: May require authorization for access to information systems.

Actor‑Holder: Assembly of Contracting Parties to GRATK
Action: Power: May establish technical working groups to address matters related to information systems.
Duty: Must adopt measures necessary for effective implementation of the Treaty.
Liberty: Free to determine the appropriate method of implementing the Treaty within its legal system.
